subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Werth homered in his first three at-bats and tied a Philadelphia Phillies record by driving in eight runs in a 10-3 victory against the visiting Toronto Blue Jays on Friday night.
snippet: Jason Werth homered in his first three at-bats and tied a Philadelphia Phillies record by driving in eight runs in a 10-3 victory against the visiting Toronto Blue Jays on Friday night.
